      To get the user operations

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void creep(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      If mouse click the spider button then execute this method This method reflect to the Creep class which save in the dao package
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAllinfo() 
      void initUnits()
      If mouse enter the primary stage, initialize all the required units
      void listQuake(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      If mouse click the list button then execute this method This method will link to all the quake which save in the database and then it will refresh the quake list, quake map.
      void search(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      If mouse click the search button then execute this method This method will get all the data the user has modify in the UI interface and put it into database to get the filter data which satisfy the UI interface and it will then refresh the quake list, quake map.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
